name: The Dark Summit
description:
This game is incomplete!

You may be out of the snow, but you aren't out of danger. Between the cold, the cultists, and a terrifying monster, you'll need both bravery and caution to survive the night!

Controls: Keyboard and mouse
Alt-F4 to quit!

Planned features:

  • First person
  • Survival horror
  • The monster can't find you in the darkness - but you'll freeze without a fire!
  • Combat with cultists
  • Terrifying monster
  • Orignal sound track
    • Made in a week by:
  • Mukund (Animations and design)
  • Daf (Environments and design)
  • Harvey (Design, sound, music, writing)

Additional support from Alon and Empeh

Voice acting by Tom Glivear
